mcm.graphics
Class TextShape

java.lang.Object
  mcm.graphics.Shape
      mcm.graphics.TextShape

public class TextShape
extends Shape

TextShapes serve to display one line Strings

Author:
Monika Mevenkamp

Constructor Detail

TextShape

public TextShape(java.lang.String text,
                 Drawable stage)
Creates a TextShape object with the given text and the default font.

See Also:
TextShape(String, Font, Drawable)

TextShape

public TextShape(java.lang.String text,
                 java.awt.Font font,
                 Drawable stage)
Creates a TextShape object with the given text and font. Its width and height is computed on the basis of the given font and stage. Its hotSpot mode is set to Shape.CENTER. Sets the font to a default font if a null font is passed.

Parameters:
text - the string to use as text
font - the font to use when displaying this TextShape
stage - the stage on which this shape will be painted
Method Detail

setFont

public void setFont(java.awt.Font fnt)
Sets this shape's font to the given font. Sets the font to a default font if the given font equals null.

Parameters:
fnt - null or the new font

setText

public void setText(java.lang.String txt)
Sets this shape's font to the given font. Sets the font to a default font if the given font equals null.

Parameters:
txt - the shape's new text

getText

public java.lang.String getText()
Returns the shape's text string.
